data.name: Zombie Army 4: Horror Headgear Pack
data.detailed_description:
Dress like the damned with this Horror Headgear Pack!

When your foes are as horrifying as they come…sometimes you need to scare them right back. Strap on some horrifying masks and put the fear back into your foes!
This Bundle contains the following 4 pieces of Horror Headgear, usable by all characters:
• Dollface Mask
• Sack Head Mask
• Zombie Skull Mask
• Zombie Skin Mask
data.about_the_game:
Dress like the damned with this Horror Headgear Pack!

When your foes are as horrifying as they come…sometimes you need to scare them right back. Strap on some horrifying masks and put the fear back into your foes!

• Zombie Skin Mask
data.short_description: Dress like the damned with this Horror Headgear Pack!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.
